author: Muhammad Khairul Adib Muhammad Yusof
comment: These are some of the best watchfaces you can get for AW smartwatches. I'd give 5 stars but, I don't think the Hud watchface's ambient mode is burn in safe since the digital clock font is 'fill' type instead of outline. I suggest you take a look at this

author: J Chase
comment: Well-designed, fairly simple watch faces. Would be great if we could actually select the colors for the faces that constantly change color.

author: Craig Kempson
comment: Great collection of well thought out and designed faces, instantly growing your collection with usable options, not tat.

author: Jody Thomas
comment: Some of the best watch faces for Android wear. Well designed and clean.

author: andrew bradley
comment: Some really lovely faces, simple and elegant designs.

author: Karl Silla Rantai
comment: Earlier versions lacked flexibility in options. Much more functional watch faces that are well designed.
Lovely watch faces and a for free. Got to be worth giving author five stars.

author: Jan Ostrówka
comment: The custom data option is great! + The watchfaces are extremely well designed.

comment: Thanks ! USTWO is always the best!

comment: Makes watch attractive.

comment: Coolest app ever

comment: Good face watch

author: Aaron Spira
comment: Ah
I love it

author: Cheng Zhang
comment: sooo cool
Good

author: Tim Wolf
comment: Does not show up in my watchfaces after android wear 2 update.  Edit -   Yes, how un userfriendly doing all of those actions on a tiny screen! But your watchfaces are now installed and I love them :) Thx!

reply.author: ustwo
reply.content: Hello! The process for installing watch faces has changed in 2.0- you'll need to open the Play Store app on your watch, scroll down to ""Apps on your phone"" and install the watch face from there. Otherwise, you can search for and install our watch faces directly from the watch's Play Store app.

author: Morgan Cowley
comment: I love the watch faces on this app! Unfortunately, I can't use them. When I install the app I can see the faces on my watch for a minute, then they disappear. I'm using a moto 360. Please help!

reply.author: ustwo
reply.content:
Would you mind providing some detail about your issue? We'd love to help!

Hit us up on wearissues@ustwo.com for assistance!

Thanks for your time,
ustwo
wearissues@ustwo.com

author: Marcel Lone
comment: These are wonderful, clean and stylish watch faces. Why only 4 stars? Unfortunately peek cards are not visible in ambient mode, this should be configurable!

author: Christoffer Lilja
comment: If this app doesn't show in your Android Wear app and your watch. Try to reinstall it, it showed up for me after reinstalling.

author: Tzvee Zahavy
comment: Can't find  the faces in the Android Wear app. Not appearing under MORE. Using Gear Live watch with Galaxy S7 phone.

reply.author: ustwo
reply.content:
Sorry for the confusion! Right now, we only support devices running Android Wear.

Thanks,
ustwo

author: Dough Meh
comment: Just wish there was an option to make the cards smaller. Using the invert face.
title: Very nice watches

author: Christopher Hall
comment: Watch Faces are great. My favorite is the invert face. Is there anyway you can make a garnet and black one??
title: Love these watchfaces

comment: I really don't have a watch that's why ı give my stars ..  I'm just want know that can ı use this for gear s3 classic one ? Or its just for moto 360 and others ?

reply.author: ustwo
reply.content:
We only support Android Wear devices at this time.

Thanks,
ustwo

author: Bhushan Date
comment: I have used each and every watch face on my Asus zenwatch 2. It works just fine..
title: Cool works excellently

author: Kalpit Dabholkar
comment: I can't find watch faces in my wear app. It can be seen in wear but not in app and I mean not in the more watch faces also.....please help

reply.author: ustwo
reply.content: All of our watch faces are accessible through the Android Wear App under the "More Watch Faces" button at the top of the Android Wear App home screen. There, you'll find all of the watch faces available. Tap the icon/button to select the face and it will appear. Hope this helps! Thank you for your time, ustwo wearissues@ustwo.com

title: Can't find watch faces

author: Top Music
comment: It's not my style but definitely lots of enjoyable faces
title: Lots of faces

author: Xuhaib Shaheen
comment: After installing the application nothing appears
title: Nothing visible

author: Brian Denney
comment: Downloaded this app to my phone and it's not showing up on my home menu and I can't find it anywhere. Kind of suspicious to me...

reply.author: ustwo
reply.content: Are you running Android Wear 2.0 on your watch? If so, the process for installing watch faces has changed- you'll need to open the Play Store app on your watch, scroll down to ""Apps on your phone"" and install the watch face from there. Otherwise, you can search for and install our watch faces directly from the watch's Play Store app.

author: ERROR UNKNOWNUSER
comment: How do I use it on my watch? The app nor the watch face pop up on my phone, gear manager app, or my watch. Please help me out here. Thanks

reply.author: ustwo
reply.content:
Hi!

All of our watch faces are accessible through the Android Wear App under the "More Watch Faces" button at the top of the Android Wear App home screen. There, you'll find all of the watch faces available. Tap the icon/button to select the face and it will appear.

Hope this helps!

Thank you for your time,
ustwo
wearissues@ustwo.com

reply.content:

All of our watch faces are accessible through the Android Wear App under the "More Watch Faces" button at the top of the Android Wear App home screen. There you'll find all of the available watch faces. Tap the button to select the face and it will appear. Hope this helps!

Thank you for your time,
ustwo

author: Jonas Kennedy
comment: Just got a moto 360 and none of the watch faces are showing up in the watch faces page

reply.author: ustwo
reply.content:
Hi, Jonas!

All of our watch faces are accessible through the Android Wear App under the "More Watch Faces" button at the top of the Android Wear App home screen. There you'll find all of the available watch faces. Tap the button to select the face.  On Moto360, it may also take some time for the watch faces to appear. Hope this helps!

Best,
ustwo
